reasoning_log: The matching process relied on identifying unique architectural features mentioned in the tags. Desc_4 was uniquely matched to Image_4 due to the presence of the '大面鏡櫃' (large mirrored cabinet). Desc_3 was matched to Image_3 based on the '附玻璃拉門區' (area with glass sliding door) and excellent natural light. Desc_2 was matched to Image_2 by the '長形格局' (long layout) and the visible '預留電線' (reserved wires). Desc_1 and Desc_5 both describe open kitchen/living spaces (Image_1 and Image_5 are visually near-identical). Desc_5 was assigned to Image_5 because it specifically mentions '廚房帶窗' and '濕區分色地坪', features clearly visible in both images, leaving Desc_1 for Image_1, which also fits the general description of an open kitchen space with basic amenities.

matching_result_list.evidence: Open kitchen/living space featuring basic kitchen counter ('基本廚具') and new wood laminate flooring, consistent with a general open layout description.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 自然採光佳(靠窗區域明亮提升居住舒適度), 廚房帶窗(料理時可開窗排煙通風較佳), 基礎收納(上下廚櫃可收納餐具與雜物), 濕區分色地坪(廚房區使用不同地材方便清潔), 小家庭適用格局(廚房與起居緊鄰照顧小孩方便), 管線外露少(整體視覺簡潔減少日後整理負擔)

matching_result_list.evidence: Long, rectangular room ('長形格局') with decorative wall paneling and clearly visible exposed wires hanging from the ceiling ('預留電線'), indicating a base decoration stage.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 長形格局(空間狹長適合作臥房或多功能室), 預留電線(牆面走線可加裝燈具或電視), 隔音潛力(全封閉牆面利於後續隔音處理), 裝潢基底完成(造型天花與壁面已施工減少裝修成本), 地板狀況佳(木地板平整適合直接入住), 採光一般(僅端部門口採光需依賴外側空間光線)
